title: 8周年コンテスト・ハブ
content:
[[module css]]

.contest{
   font-weight: bold;
   font-size: 180%;
   padding-top: 40px;
   padding-bottom: 40px;
}

.presenter{
   font-weight: bold;
   font-size: 120%;
}

[[/module]]

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A1988496-11-2glb/8th-logo-1.png]]

------
= **買いなよ、ウチなら安いぜ。**
[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A4053112-52-iw7h/stasutabadenaguru2.png]]

[[=]]
**Round 0**
[[span class="contest"]][[[*http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/forum/t-14038574/scp-af2021-jp|適正価格コンテスト]]][[/span]]

[[span class="presenter"]]produced by: [[*user Nanigashi Sato]] + AF-2021-JP企画委員会[[/span]]
**4/1**

------
= **さあ、己の力で殴り合え！**
[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:6169929-40-y712/sutegoro2.png]]

[[=]]
**Round 1**
[[span class="contest"]][[[*http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/sutegorocontest-2021-hub|素手喧嘩コンテスト]]][[/span]]

[[span class="presenter"]]produced by: [[*user Jiraku_Mogana]] + 8周年企画委員会[[/span]]
**4/4 ~ 5/8**

優勝作品
[[[SCP-2430-JP]]] 
by [[*user yagisawaan]]

------

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A4137401-5-9zuj/%E8%A8%80%E9%9C%8A%E3%83%90%E3%83%8A%E3%83%BC.png]]

**Round 2**
[[span class="contest"]][[[*http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/kotodama-contest-2021|令和三年度三題噺言霊競演]]][[/span]]

[[span class="presenter"]]produced by: [[*user Nanigashi Sato]] + 8周年企画委員会[[/span]]
**5/31 ~ 6/14**

優勝作品
[[[SCP-2955-JP]]]
by [[*user indonootoko]]

------

= **夏は夜。月の頃はさらなり。**

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2712598-2-8atl/yorucon-02.png]]

**Round 3**
[[span class="contest"]][[[*http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/yorucontest2021-hub|夜のコンテスト]]][[/span]]

[[span class="presenter"]]produced by: [[*user solvex]] + 8周年企画委員会[[/span]]
**7/26 ~ 8/30**

**闇夜部門**
[[[scp-2332-jp|]]] - あさなしさまきたる
by [[*user Fennecist]]

**月夜部門**
[[[hotaruikenohotorinite|]]]
by [[*user mojamoja]]

**夕闇部門**
[[[times-of-day|]]]
by [[*user Dr_Knotty]]

------
[[=]]
**五人のひとの中にゆかしき物みせ給へらんに**
**御志まさりたりとてつかふまつらんと**
[[/=]]

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:3438721-124-kvjx/otsukimi_banner_animated.svg]]

[[span class="contest"]][[[*http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/pile-up-dumplings-2021|十五夜お団子フェスティバル]]][[/span]]

[[span class="presenter"]]produced by: [[*user Mishary]] + 8周年企画委員会[[/span]]
**9/1 ~ 9/30+α**

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2577572-287-j039/omiai-2.png]]

[[span class="contest"]][[[*http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/matchmaking2021|財団日本支部お見合い計画2021]]][[/span]]

[[span class="presenter"]]produced by: [[*user Nanigashi Sato]] + 8周年企画委員会[[/span]]
**10/31 ~ 11/22**
　

------
= **持続可能な共同怪奇創作計画(SCPs)**

[[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A4137401-9-eqpq/%E3%83%AA%E3%82%B5%E3%82%B3%E3%83%B3%E3%83%90%E3%83%8A%E3%83%BC1.png]]

**Round 4**
[[span class="contest"]][[[*http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/recyclecontest21|リサイクルコンテスト2021]]][[/span]]

[[span class="presenter"]]produced by:[[*user stengan774]] + 8周年企画委員会[[/span]]
**11/19 ~ --01/22-- 01/24**

**金賞**
[[[SCP-2601-JP]]] - わたしとやよいちゃんとみゆきちゃんと
by [[*user solvex]]

**銀賞**
[[[news4pamwac-id-brightred|]]]
by [[*user kyougoku08]]

**銅賞**
[[[SCP-2366-JP]]] - 河童願うに、この種絶やすべし
by [[*user stengan774]]
